data.text:
One day, while I was at the 
gym, I heard strange murmuring…
data.processed:
󠁿One day, while I was at the 
󠁿gym, I heard strange murmuring…

data.text:
Deadlifting… Dead… 
Why does it have such a scary name…?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Deadlifting… Dead… 
󠁿Why does it have such a scary name…?

data.text:
Well it doesn't matter! Since Prez can do it, 
I can too! Welp, guess I'll start with 200kg!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Well it doesn't matter! Since Prez can do it, 
󠁿I can too! Welp, guess I'll start with 200kg!

data.text:
Uwaaah! T-Trainer?! Don't surprise me like 
that! I was just about to do some deading.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Uwaaah! T-Trainer?! Don't surprise me like 
󠁿that! I was just about to do some deading.

data.text:
Yup! It's one of the things on my muscle 
building regimen! It's called "deadlifting".
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Yup! It's one of the things on my muscle 
󠁿building regimen! It's called "deadlifting".

data.text:
You grab the barbell with both hands. 
Then you scream while you raise it above your waist.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿You grab the barbell with both hands. 
󠁿Then you scream while you raise it above your waist.

data.text:
But I heard that Prez could 
lift 200kg, so I figured I'd try it too!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿But I heard that Prez could 
󠁿lift 200kg, so I figured I'd try it too!

data.text:
It would be impossible for her to 
lift that much weight from the start. 
I recommended her a similarly effective training, but…
data.processed:
󠁿It would be impossible for her to 
󠁿lift that much weight from the start. 
󠁿I recommended her a similarly effective training, but…

data.text:
Nngh… But I wanna do the same weight as her! 
There has to be a reason why she chose that weight!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Nngh… But I wanna do the same weight as her! 
󠁿There has to be a reason why she chose that weight!

data.text:
If I don't do the same things as her, I won't be 
able to catch up to her. That's why I have to do it!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿If I don't do the same things as her, I won't be 
󠁿able to catch up to her. That's why I have to do it!

data.text: Anyways, here I go!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Anyways, here I go!

data.text:
Y-Yay, I did it! Trainer, were you watching? I 
was able to lift the same weight as Prez did!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Y-Yay, I did it! Trainer, were you watching? I 
󠁿was able to lift the same weight as Prez did!

data.text:
Right? I just need to keep up this pace and I'll 
be able to pass up Prez!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Right? I just need to keep up this pace and I'll 
󠁿be able to pass up Prez!

data.text:
I can do this…! I can really do this! I think I 
can take on all of Prez's training regimens now!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿I can do this…! I can really do this! I think I 
󠁿can take on all of Prez's training regimens now!

data.text: Alrighty then, I'll move onto the next training!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Alrighty then, I'll move onto the next training!

data.text:
Without heeding any of my warnings, Tokai Teio 
meticulously continued her strength training
data.processed:
󠁿Without heeding any of my warnings, Tokai Teio 
󠁿meticulously continued her strength training

data.text: The Next Day.
data.processed: 󠁿The Next Day.

data.text: Traaiineer… Trai– Gah!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Traaiineer… Trai– Gah!

data.text:
Ugh… my whole body is sore… 
and all my muscles hurt…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Ugh… my whole body is sore… 
󠁿and all my muscles hurt…

data.text:
But it's a sign that it's working, right?! The 
more it hurts, the more your muscles grow! Guess 
I should head to the racetrack…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿But it's a sign that it's working, right?! The 
󠁿more it hurts, the more your muscles grow! Guess 
󠁿I should head to the racetrack…

data.text:
Agahgahgah… It hurts too much! I don't think I 
can train like this!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Agahgahgah… It hurts too much! I don't think I 
󠁿can train like this!

data.text:
Nngh… Maybe I did go a bit overboard. But I just 
followed Prez's training regimen…
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: It's because you didn't pace yourself…

data.processed:
󠁿Nngh… Maybe I did go a bit overboard. But I just 
󠁿followed Prez's training regimen…

data.text: Huh? Oh, maybe you're right.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Huh? Oh, maybe you're right.

data.text:
Yeah, I might have gotten a little too carried 
away. I should have talked to you about it, huh?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, I might have gotten a little too carried 
󠁿away. I should have talked to you about it, huh?

data.text:
I'm really sorry about this, so is there 
anything you can do about this pain?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿I'm really sorry about this, so is there 
󠁿anything you can do about this pain?

data.text:
I don't want to be out of commission for a whole 
day, so please do something! Please!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿I don't want to be out of commission for a whole 
󠁿day, so please do something! Please!?

data.text:
After listening to her pleas, I decided to have 
her stretch and warm her muscles a bit. Then…
data.processed:
󠁿After listening to her pleas, I decided to have 
󠁿her stretch and warm her muscles a bit. Then…

data.text:
Woah, what the heck?! That was so 
easy! Trainer, are you some kinda 
genius? Why was that so effective?
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: It was thanks to your own flexibility.

data.processed:
󠁿Woah, what the heck?! That was so 
󠁿easy! Trainer, are you some kinda 
󠁿genius? Why was that so effective?

data.text:
Mine? Really? My muscles may not be as strong 
and stiff as Prez's, but maybe that means they 
also heal faster. Ehehe♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Mine? Really? My muscles may not be as strong 
󠁿and stiff as Prez's, but maybe that means they 
󠁿also heal faster. Ehehe♪

data.text:
Alrighty then, now I can get 
back to training! Agaaaaaah!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Alrighty then, now I can get 
󠁿back to training! Agaaaaaah!

data.text:
Aww, really? I guess even for me, going straight 
back to training is impossible. Dangit…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Aww, really? I guess even for me, going straight 
󠁿back to training is impossible. Dangit…

data.text:
Okay fine, I guess I'll take today off… I'm 
sorry for all of this, Trainer…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Okay fine, I guess I'll take today off… I'm 
󠁿sorry for all of this, Trainer…

data.text:
But just you wait, I'm not going to stay so 
weak! I'm going to get stronger!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿But just you wait, I'm not going to stay so 
󠁿weak! I'm going to get stronger!
